thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 3 of 447
thread.title: John Payne

author: John Payne
title: John Payne
text:
The salesman who helped us was a pleasure to deal with. Cedric at the Morrow GA location is the man to see! We went to many different dealerships and got tired of the games and being lied to by one more than once! Out of all the trucks we had looked at at other places, we got the best payment and lowest down payment at Drivetime!
Cedric even drove me up to the Stone Mountain location to pick up the truck I was interested in. Great guy to deal with! I would highly recommend anybody in the market for a vehicle to go give Drivetime a chance to earn your business, while you're there ask to see my new friend Cedric!
